contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|BRB}} '''BRB''' stands for: * ''"Be right back"'', [[wikt:Appendix:English internet slang|internet/chat slang]], also sometimes treated as a synonym of "bathroom break" * [[The Beatles: Rock Band]] * Buckling-Restrained Braced Frame, a specialized earthquake bracing system. See [[BRBF]] and [[Buckling Restrained Brace]] * [[Bank of the Republic of Burundi]] or ''Banque de la République du Burundi'', the official name in French of the central bank of Burundi * ''Bayerische Regiobahn'', a train company in Bavaria, Germany * [[Benefits Review Board]], a part of the United States Department of Labor * ''Bibliothèque royale de Belgique'', the [[Royal Library of Belgium]] * [[Big red button]], a type of command button * [[Birmingham Royal Ballet]], a ballet company * [[Blaire Reinhard Band]], a New Jersey rock band * ''[[BRB Internacional]]'', a Spanish animation studio. * ''[[Brienz Rothorn Bahn]]'', a Swiss railway * ''[[Brigade de répression du banditisme]]'', a special police unit of the French Ministry of the Interior. * [[British Railways Board]], the former governing body of British Railways **[[BRB (Residuary) Ltd.]], its successor * BRB, the [[International Organization for Standardization|ISO]] 3166-1 3-letter country code for [[Barbados]] * BRB, the [[German car number plates|car number plate]] for [[Brandenburg (town)|Brandenburg an der Havel]] * The [[blood-retinal barrier]], cells in the eye that prevent certain substances from entering the tissue of the retina {{disambig}}
